website_summaries.verdict: The Sony Cyber-shot DSC-HX90V has an incredible zoom range and an excellent EVF, but its images suffer when the light gets low.
cons: Lacks continuous autofocus setting for still images

customer_reviews.title: Could have been great..,
customer_reviews.text: So disappointing. I bought this to carry around when not using my DSLR but the quality of the test shots were so poor that frankly I could produce better with my phone. The good points - fantastically compact, great zoom range and it has a viewfinder, albeit very small. The downsides are the picture quality and the generally insubstantial feel of the build. I returned it and have bought a Lumix LX100 - great lens, bigger sensor far better viewfinder but shorter zoom range. You pays your money and takes your choices - for me the Lumix is far far better.
customer_reviews.author: Bristol boy

customer_reviews.title: just feels a bit too small to handle so need to get a good grip before shooting otherwise fingers can easily spread to ...
customer_reviews.text: A camera that does so much, just feels a bit too small to handle so need to get a good grip before shooting otherwise fingers can easily spread to other controls by mistake. Quality of images is reasonably good for a camera of this size.
customer_reviews.author: Bonzo

customer_reviews.title: Almost 5-star
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality images even under default automatic settings. Obviously a powerful and highly customisable camera. If I were to be picky, the only negatives I have encountered so far: (1) concerned that the manually popped-up viewfinder and flash may be a bit fragile; (2) very tricky to find right settings for optimum focus, especially for macro (same as every camera I have had!); rather non-intuitive manual and on-camera settings. But overall, this would be a good purchase for a bridge camera with powerful optical zoom (and good image stabilisation even at full optical zoom of 20x) and highly customisable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Camera
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely fantastic camera and the zoom feature is amazing too. It's a very lightweight and fits perfectly into a pocket. Most of the features and controls as per an SLR but miniature form. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey John Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect compact camera ?
customer_reviews.text: The Perfect compact camera ! - You choose more automatic settings or manual - just perfect. - Perfect full colored pictures and with great resolution and little noise. - Great zoom - 30x optic - Includes GPS receiver, not some faulty interaction with your mobile (it is not working for Canon...). Have had it for 2 month and it have been perfect in poor light conditions, in high sun and with moving targets.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Greenvalley

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera
customer_reviews.text: Stunning camera and great build. Don't have time to write s detailed review but if you need s view finder as the rear screen with not be visible in string sun light and it's nice to have 30 optical zoom and you don't want to spend £1,100 for an RX100 this is definitely the camera for you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hubbard

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Camera apart from one thing
customer_reviews.text: Almost everything about this camera is brilliant, especially the x30 zoom. The only problem is the on/off button which is a real pain in that it is slightly indented making it awkward to turn on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Baggie Dave

customer_reviews.title: Camera great. Useless European to uk adapter which does not ...
customer_reviews.text: Camera great. Useless European to uk adapter which does not fit a uk socket. I’ve had to use a separate eu to uk adapter. Not good for an expensive camera.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Williams

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Zoom is great, optical viewfinder is even better (in very bright light), folding screen is good for selfies, wifi is great for tablet / phone connectivity and transfer of photos, this camera has it all.
customer_reviews.author: M. Filip

customer_reviews.title: Had a problem with view finder, the problem was ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a problem with view finder, the problem was Me not understanding how it worked. So sorry let's go digital thank you for your prompt help.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Pamela Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Photos quality is really good.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a replacement for a Lumix LX7 which had gone kaput. Not built as heavily as the Lumix, and the knobs/switches feel a bit flimsy, but no problems so far. Photos quality is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smal things come in excellent packages
customer_reviews.text: This tiny camera is awesome not her description fits. I purchased from Amazon warehouse and the box had obviously been opened. But unfortunately it seemed to develop a fault so I sent it back and purchased a new one elsewhere. If you like travel photography just buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Chris J. Lloyd

customer_reviews.title: European plug in the box, and no adapter.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera to replace the previous version of the HX90v, lost on holiday, so I am not expecting any surprises in performance, and I chose to replace it with identical because I like the way it performs. Only four stars though because this seller clearly imports from EU - it was a European plug in the box not UK one.
customer_reviews.author: GJ49

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing camera for it's size. I particularly like the way you can control it from your phone via wifi, and then transfer the photos direct to your television in true high definition.
customer_reviews.author: I. Mcculloch

customer_reviews.title: Great camera- no regrets
customer_reviews.text: Camera is great - it arrived a week or so before the estimated delivery date. It came from France - i did not see any options for a quicker delivery date.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Camera of the year yes I'll have one of these thank you
customer_reviews.text: Well I am very impressed with this camera vaulted camera of the year in compact category last year brilliant can't wait to take it on holiday and take all those 4K videos
customer_reviews.author: Jester Studs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far have found this easy to use, the test will be on holiday :-)
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Good, but limited at max zoom
customer_reviews.text: Good versatile portable camera with a great zoom, however results at full zoom are less than satisfactory unless in full sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: I T.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: GOOG CAMERA but lacks instructions with the camera for easy use.||
customer_reviews.author: M tikka

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why this came with a European plug when purchased from Amazon.co.uk direct
customer_reviews.author: Sturgi

customer_reviews.title: It arrived as an Australian import with a broken seal ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived as an Australian import with a broken seal (and another seal taped over it to hide the fact). This was bought from Applied Centre. Naturally it got sent back.
customer_reviews.author: a fish out of batter

customer_reviews.title: At last! An ideal camera for the traveller.
customer_reviews.text: Best point and shoot camera I ever had! Pop up viewfinder for those occasions when the sun is too bright. GPS to show you on a map where you took the photo (although it sometimes takes a little time to pick up the satellites). Wifi to upload photos to tablet or iPhone. Excellent lens. Fantastic optical zoom. And the camera is small enough to fit in a pocket. What more could you want? So good I bought another for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: A. J. Morison

customer_reviews.title: IT'S THE BEST POCKET-SIZE CAMERA OF ITS TYPE
customer_reviews.text: If you don't want to carry about a large cumbersome SLR camera with all that changing lenses etc then this is the best choice available -brilliant results - very compact - has pop-up viewfinder (bit fiddly but still great to have) - high quality Zeiss lens - takes great close-up shots - even at the top end of the zoom the results are surprising - fits in shirt pocket - nothing else come close as far as I'm concerned. I'm not sure that even Sony will be able to improve it with an update although if the could build the viewfinder into the main body I'd be first in the queue.
customer_reviews.author: THEscorcher!

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera... I have used many cameras and this is the best!! Loaded with features if you want to play but great auto modes too. Make sure you check out the shooting tips on board.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: it frequently wont focus when you need it to so ...
customer_reviews.text: it frequently wont focus when you need it to so you will miss shots whilst wrestling with the focus system. Also the lens barrel isn't sealed so acts as a bellows sucking any dust into the lens housing when zooming in and out. This means that, very quickly, there is a build up of dust within the lens housing that will affect every photo taken. There is no way to dislodge this dust on the lenses unless you strip the whole lens barrel down which requires expertise.
customer_reviews.author: tigger

product_meta.title: Sony DSC-HX90VB.CE3 Cyber-SHOT DSC-HX90V Compact Camera with 30x Optical Zoom, 18.2MP, 3-Inch LCD - Black
product_meta.description:
Objectif zoom optique 30x T Vario-Sonnar de ZEISS pour des images extrêmement claires Capteur CMOS Exmor R 18,2 mégapixels pour une qualité d'image optimale même dans l'obscurité Le moteur de traitement de l'image BIONZ X offre plus de détails et moins de bruit Viseur OLED Tru-Finder rétractable pour une vision plus nette et un meilleur fonctionnement Ecran LCD inclinable à 180° pour cadrer facilement vos selfies et prises de vue en position basse Objectif zoom 30x doté de la qualité ZEISS Zeiss bénéficiant de plus de 150 ans d'expérience dans l'optique de haute précision, le résultat est évident : cet objectif 24-720 mm sublime vos portraits, gros plans et paysages de façon naturelle avec une netteté et un contraste éclatants, quelle que soit la perspective. Le revêtement multicouche anti-reflet T de Zeiss élimine efficacement les reflets et l'effet ''fantôme''. Capteur CMOS Exmor R pour une sensibilité accrue Plus le capteur reçoit de lumière, plus l'image produite sera brillante. C'est pourquoi le capteur CMOS Exmor R, avec ses 18,2 mégapixels effectifs, est deux fois plus sensible à la lumière et présente un design rétroéclairé qui lui permet de laisser entrer quatre fois plus de lumière qu'un capteur classique. Il est aussi doté de la technologie de conversion en colonne A/N de Sony afin de réduire le bruit de l'image.
